H0.text: Who killed Goliath with a sling and a stone. Jonathan

H1.text: Who killed Goliath with a sling and a stone. Saul

H2.text: Who killed Goliath with a sling and a stone. Samson

H3.text: Who killed Goliath with a sling and a stone. داود

A4.text: In 1 Samuel 17, David kills Goliath with a stone from his sling.

A5.text: 2 Samuel 21:19 states that Elhanan, son of Jair, killed Goliath the Gittite.
